structure.unit: A AUTOMATED MOTOR VEHICLE REGISTRATION SYSTEM

law.catch_line: Cabinet authorized to promulgate administrative regulations and institute programs.
law.text: The Transportation Cabinet shall have any and all necessary power and authority, subject to appropriate provision of the statutes, to promulgate administrative regulations and institute such programs as are reasonably necessary to carry out the provisions of this chapter.
law.history: Amended 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 128, sec. 1, effective July 15, 1998. -- Created 1976 Ky. Acts ch. 133, sec. 22.
